title: Research
text: I work on problems related to precision poultry nutrition, stochastic feed formulation, and nutrient variability.

title: Research
text:
Current Projects

Stochastic Feed Formulation â€” integrating nutrient variability into diet models.
Soybean Meal Quality â€” modeling processing effects on digestibility.
Broiler Breeder Precision Nutrition â€” evaluating nutritional strategies under heat stress.
Nutrient Variability in Feed Ingredients â€” quantifying and classifying variability in nutrient profiles.
